ygData.subject: Re: Unique Items
ygData.msgSnippet: Good Point Michael, however since I have no life (ha ha) I ll be doing the work on it. I ve already gathered quite a library of things, it will be database
ygData.messageBody:
Good Point Michael, however since I have no life (ha ha) I'll be doing the
work on it. I've already gathered quite a library of things, it will be
database driven, and *will* be maintained.

I look forward to your submission!

-----Original Message-----
From: Michael Ott [mailto:mott@...]
Sent: Tuesday, June 29, 1999 5:03 PM
To: 'EQCheats@onelist.com'
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Unique Items


From: Michael Ott <mott@...>

its a good idea if it is carried through... so far i have yet to see a site
that really does that. No one takes the time to actually build a database of
stuff most rely on volunteer submissions wh8ich sucks because you dont get a
good response that way. Whoever runs a site needs to go out and do most of
the research and keep it up with all of the current patches once again I
have not yet seen this...

-----Original Message-----
From: Jason Harrell [mailto:jharrell@...]
Sent: Tuesday, June 29, 1999 2:45 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: [EQCheats] Unique Items


From: "Jason Harrell" <jharrell@...>

I think this would be a good forum to ask for this. Currently I am
developing a site for EQ dedicated strictly to the items, how to get them,
and buy/sell them (in game only of course). I'm not interested in the
standard Leather Arms, etc. There are plenty of sites out there that deal
with this. I *am* interested in anything out of the ordinary, where it came
from and the quest associated with it. This is a full-on spoiler option,
which I have no personal problem with, and if you're subscribed to this list
neither should you.

All I ask is 3 quick things for submissions: a screen shot displaying the
item and the stats on it, a brief description of how you came across it, and
the quest information associated. The second two are optional since even I
hate campers, but they'd really help those of us who go get the item, then
leave the spawn to the others to do the same.

A. Would EQ players go to this site?
B. Is this a good idea?

Anyone wishing to help out will get credit on the site for the submissions
(of course).

E-mail any submissions to trajen@...

Thanks all!

Trajen D'Fraust
Barbarian Shaman
Lord of the Divinity, Order of Deus Vult
